summary:
Network , infrastructure and solutions architect. Social, enthusiastic, communicatively strong, skillful and always busy with the newest technology, without losing track of reality (current technology). Always with a perfect overview of all components. Who dares to ask questions and is perfectly comfortable in whiteboard sessions or during presentations. Loves designing and commonly accused of the term “Perfectionist”. Strong in communication, from engineers to C-level management. Understands and owns the architectural chain.

Early adapter of Cisco ACI (7+ years). Stretched fabric, multi pod and multi site. First in Europe to design and implement a green field Cisco ACI-environment with the combination Hyper-V, Cisco UCS, EMC-storage as a network architect, network specialist and team lead. Designed and implemented a green field Artificial Intelligence environment combined with Tanzu and Kubernetes with Cisco ACI.

Network, infrastructure and solution architect of multiple Enterprise environments, including hospitals, financial and high tech multinationals.

Cisco ACI, DNA and SDA specialist. Project and team lead of multiple black building tests. VMWare, Hyper-V, Active/Active BGP-implementations. AWS. Azure. SIEM. NSX-T. Agile/Scrum. Scrum master. Palo Alto Traps. Phyton. Anti-DDOS protection and lots of other projects, techniques and functions. Guided multiple RFP-projects as architect and technical specialist for firewalls, data centers, network equipment and all other components in Enterprise environments.

Certified:
TOGAF 9.2
SAFe PO/PM
Cisco Certified Specialist - Enterprise Design
Cisco Certified Specialist - Enterprise Core
Cisco Certified Specialist - Enterprise Advanced Infrastructure Implementation
Cisco Certified Specialist - Data Center ACI Implementation

Juniper
ITILv3
Storage Area Networking
IBM storage en cloud architect
LogRhythm Certified Professional (SIEM)
Microsoft server en cliënt 
Citrix

Attended the following Cisco Live events:
Cisco Live 2017 Berlin 
(reference customer Cisco ACI and the integration between Cisco ACI and Netscalers/firewalls/Hyper-V)
Cisco Live 2018 Barcelona 
(reference customer Cisco ACI and Cisco Network Assurance Engine
Cisco Live 2020 Barcelona

profile_positions.description: Specialized in next generation techniques and artificial infra intelligence, without losing track of reality (current technologies). Working as a interim infrastructure and solutions architect for multiple customers in multinational Enterprise environments.
profile_positions.title: Infrastructure and solutions architect

profile_positions.description:
Helping the Catharina Hospital in Eindhoven to make the step towards a fully segmented next generation future proof IT-infrastructure, with focus on security, scalability, continuity, automation and a software defined IT-environment. 

Designed the new IT-infrastructure able to land the current Hospital environment, using the following techniques: software defined networking (Cisco ACI multi pod, Cisco SDA), Identity and access management (Cisco ISE, including SGT), next generation firewalls (multiple vendors), assurance and automation (Cisco DNA, Python), orchestration, DMZ, load balancers, Kubernetes, Cloud, etcetera.
Designed and implemented a NSX-T Artificial Intelligence environment built on Tanzu and Kubernetes with Cisco ACI. Realizing the new IT-infrastructure and migrating from the current infrastructure to the new IT-infrastructure was a big part of the assignment. 

Performing as a link between teams by working as a network architect in the architecture and network management team. Communicating between network management, architecture, project leads, management and all other hospital employees. Mapping, designing restructuring and connecting new and current applications and medical systems to the new and current IT-infrastructure. Network architecture and technical specialist in RFP-projects. Creating HLD- and LLD-designs, migration plans, impact and risk plans. Delivering technical input for changes. Organizing whiteboard sessions to share my knowledge to all colleagues of the Catharina Hospital.
profile_positions.title: Network architect

profile_positions.description: Built RockSecure from the ground up as director. Creating and perfecting the proposition and product portfolio. Market research. Helping multiple Enterprise environments to make the next step with their IT-infrastructure as a network and security architect.
profile_positions.title: Network and security architect

profile_positions.description:
First in Europe to design and implement a completely new green field future proof IT-infrastructure consisting of Cisco ACI, Hyper-V, Cisco UCS, EMC-storage (VNX and VPLEX), Citrix NetScalers, Palo Alto and Cisco Firepower firewalls.

Designed the green field IT-infrastructure as a network architect. Migrated the current IT-infrastructure as network specialist. Performed a black building test as project lead, with technical responsibility, realizing full continuation of production with one datacenter completely offline.

Realized an Active/Active BGP‑internet connection with an own RIPE-registration. Integration of Palo Alto product and Citrix NetScalers in Cisco ACI (service graph), automated with Cisco UCS-director. Bridged Cisco Firepower firewalls integrated in cisco ACI. Automated the complete Cisco ACI-environment with Python and Cisco UCS-director.

Reference customer for Cisco ACI, Cisco NAE and the integration of Cisco NetScalers and Firepower firewalls in Cisco ACI. Project lead and reference customer for Palo Alto Traps. Implementation and integration of SIEM, anti-DDOS-protection and Mobile Device Management.

Realized Agile and Scrum within the management department of VECOZO. Performed the Scrum master role for three years.
profile_positions.title: Network architect, network specialist and project lead

profile_positions.description: On-premise, hybrid and cloud storage specialist
profile_positions.title: Internship

volunteer_experiences.description: Als leider van een voetbalteam bij RKDVC, zorg ik dat de spelers de volledige focus kunnen hebben op de wedstrijd. Ik probeer de spelers te motiveren en te ondersteunen. Ik regel de voorbereiding voor de wedstrijd, de zaken tijdens de wedstrijd en alle administratieve zaken na de wedstrijd.
